Creates an instance of ServerSignerClient.

<Note>
  `ServerSignerClient` extends `BaseSignerClient`, see the docs for
  BaseSignerClient for all supported methods.
</Note>

## Import

```ts
import { ServerSignerClient } from "@account-kit/signer";
```

## Parameters

### params

`ServerSignerClientParams`
The parameters for the client, including the access key and connection configuration

### params.connection

`ConnectionConfig`
The connection configuration for the client

### params.accessKey

`string`
The access key to be used for authentication

### params.accountId

`string | undefined`
An optional ID to identify the account. Only required when using a single access key for multiple signers.
